languages.text: "Благостное прошение, ибо жизни наши не важны, а важно лишь служение наше и посрамление Его недругов".
"This plea is virtuous, for our lives are insignificant, and all that matters is our service and the condemnation of His enemies."
languages.original_text: "Благостное прошение, ибо жизни наши не важны, а важно лишь служение наше и посрамление Его недругов".

traits.locale_text: "This plea is virtuous, for our lives are insignificant, and all that matters is our service and the condemnation of His enemies."
"This plea is virtuous, for our lives are insignificant, and all that matters is our service and the condemnation of His enemies."
"This plea is virtuous, for our lives are insignificant, and all that matters is our service and the condemnation of His enemies."
"This plea is virtuous, for our lives are insignificant, and all that matters is our service and the condemnation of His enemies."
"This plea is virtuous, for our lives are insignificant, and all that matters is our service and the condemnation of His enemies."

languages.text: "Diese Bitte ist tugendhaft, denn unsere Leben sind unbedeutend, und alles, was zählt, ist unser Dienst und die Verdammung Seiner Feinde."
languages.original_text: "This plea is virtuous, for our lives are insignificant, and all that matters is our service and the condemnation of His enemies."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Bitte ist tugendhaft, denn unsere Leben sind unbedeutend, und alles, was zählt, ist unser Dienst und die Verdammung Seiner Feinde."

languages.text: « Une supplique de bon aloi, car nos vies sont insignifiantes, et seuls comptent le zèle déployé à son service et la condamnation de Ses ennemis. »
languages.original_text: "This plea is virtuous, for our lives are insignificant, and all that matters is our service and the condemnation of His enemies."

traits.locale_text: « Une supplique de bon aloi, car nos vies sont insignifiantes, et seuls comptent le zèle déployé à son service et la condamnation de Ses ennemis. »

languages.text: 「この嘆願は美徳だ。我らの生命は些細なことであり、重要なのは奉仕と敵の断罪だけなのだから」
languages.original_text: "This plea is virtuous, for our lives are insignificant, and all that matters is our service and the condemnation of His enemies."

traits.locale_text: 「この嘆願は美徳だ。我らの生命は些細なことであり、重要なのは奉仕と敵の断罪だけなのだから」

languages.text: «Esa es una plegaria virtuosa, pues nuestras vidas son insignificantes. Lo único que importa es nuestro servicio y la condena de Sus enemigos».
languages.original_text: "This plea is virtuous, for our lives are insignificant, and all that matters is our service and the condemnation of His enemies."

traits.locale_text: «Esa es una plegaria virtuosa, pues nuestras vidas son insignificantes. Lo único que importa es nuestro servicio y la condena de Sus enemigos».

languages.text: “这是个高尚的愿景。我们的生命微不足道，我们需要矢志不渝地侍奉神皇，打击祂的敌人，这才是最重要的。”
languages.original_text: "This plea is virtuous, for our lives are insignificant, and all that matters is our service and the condemnation of His enemies."

traits.locale_text: “这是个高尚的愿景。我们的生命微不足道，我们需要矢志不渝地侍奉神皇，打击祂的敌人，这才是最重要的。”

languages.text: "Faziletli bir yakarış. Nihayetinde yaşamlarımız önemsizdir ve önemli olan tek şey, O'nun adına yaptığımız hizmetler ile O'nun düşmanlarının yok edilmesidir."
languages.original_text: "This plea is virtuous, for our lives are insignificant, and all that matters is our service and the condemnation of His enemies."
